entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 6:49 PM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of light snow. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow late in the morning and in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:49 PM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow in the evening and after midnight. Clearing overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 6:49 PM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
